sql.name: queryXhIpcApplyList
sql.sqlString: select a.CUSTOMER_NAME,/*客户姓名*/ a.CUSTOMER_NUM,/*客户编号*/ a.CUSTOMER_PHONE,/*客户电话*/ a.CUSTOMER_CARD_ID,/*开户行*/ a.BANK_NAME,/*账户名*/ a.BANK_CARD_NUM,/*账（卡）号*/ a.TOGETHER_NAME,/*共借人姓名*/ a.TOGETHER_RELATION,/*共借人关系*/ a.TOGETHER_PHONE,/*共借人电话*/ a.CUSTOMER_COMP_ADDRESS,/*商铺（单位）地址*/ a.CUSTOMER_HOME_ADDRESS,/*家庭住址*/ a.TOGETHER_HOME_ADDRESS,/*共借人住址*/ a.TXL,/*通讯录 */ a.KF_EMP,/*开发信贷员 */ a.FZ_EMP,/*负责信贷员*/ a.WH_EMP,/*维护人员 */ a.LOAN_TYPE,/*借款类型*/ a.LOAN_USE,/*借款用途*/ a.ID from XH_IPC_APPLY a where 1=1 $sql
